definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: But the court did not rule on the constitutionality of the provision itself.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最高法院沒有就這一條款的合憲性作出裁決。

sentences.english: And Congress comes to the Supreme Court with a presumption of deference and constitutionality.
sentences.chinese: 和國會的尊重和合憲性推定帶有一個最高法院。

sentences.english: They evaluate the constitutionality of state laws under the state constitution.
sentences.chinese: 他們在州憲法下評估州法律的合憲性。
